body: Wow. Only 11 pages of actual story. And even that was weak ass.
it only needed one line of context to make sense....cmon
Just put in a little more story and this will be glorious

Recently I've been on Imhentai, it's a good site as lots of artworks are posted along with Hentai comics and the recommendations functions is working wonders, unlike Nhentai it's just shit 'more like this' shit recommendations, so yeah give it a try.

Classic Example of zero plot: "Everyday to help my husband"... Okay, this establishes that she's doing this to help her husband, but zero idea why, zero idea if the husband made her do this, etc. Then at the end she learns hubby had been embezzling from the company spending the money on his mistress.  Lost in translation? Still no evidence that she's a mother. The implication is that she's sacrificing herself for her husband, yet he betrayed her.  In this case, 2 sentences don't make a plot. If you're triggered by this...seek help from your local mental health professionals.

I do love Ntr the most than other tags, but sometimes Im thinking when the doujin can be just a straight up fap material, specifically doujin like this. Is it really necessary to insert "My husband" or "my boyfriend" in a random line of the dialogue?, just to brand or consider their works as a Ntr...I mean I don't hate it, but it just doesn't make sense. Also this can be enjoyed by both Ntr and vanilla readers, if there's no "partners" included in this doujin.
Just don't mind the dialogue "everyday to help my husban", and this will Straight up fap material
